org.apache.medex

Class MedTagger

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.medex.MedTagger

  • public class MedTagger
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements a semantic tagger for medication

      • writeLog

        public void writeLog(java.lang.String msg)

        Parameters:
        msg -

      • medtagging

        public void medtagging(Document doc)

        Incorporates main logic of drug identification with its signature for the given text.

        • Detect sentences in the given document
        • For each sentence
        • Identify section name based on rules
        • Generate semantic tags by calling function of "transform" from class "SemanticRuleEngine"
        • Break semantic tag list into signature list
        • For each signature list: 1> call "EarleyParser" to do semantic parsing; 2> change output format of the signatures and print out them
        Parameters:
        doc - a document object built based on a clinical note
        See Also:
        MedTagger

      • mapParsing

        private java.util.ArrayList<org.javatuples.Pair<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer>> mapParsing(java.util.ArrayList semtags,
                                                                                       java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> DGList,
                                                                                       java.util.ArrayList<org.javatuples.Pair<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer>> sent_tag_offset_final,
                                                                                       java.lang.String doc_text)
        Mapping the signature list with and without position information
        Parameters:
        DGList - signature list without position information
        sent_tag_offset_final - signature list with position information
        doc_text - original text of input sentence
        Returns:
        mapped signature list with position information
        See Also:
        MedTagger

      • formatDruglist

        private java.lang.String formatDruglist(java.lang.String DList)
        Searches token-tag list from right, to find the index of a specified token.
        Parameters:
        DList - list of strings contains drug signature e.g., ["warfarin FFF DIN", "5mg FFF DOSE"]
        Returns:
        string with drug and signature information separated by "\t" e.g., "warfarin\t\t\t5mg\t\t\t\t\t\t"
        See Also:
        MedTagger

      • breakSentenceByMed

        private static java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<org.javatuples.Quintet<java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer,org.javatuples.Pair<org.javatuples.Pair<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer>,java.lang.Integer>,java.lang.Integer>>> breakSentenceByMed(java.util.ArrayList<org.javatuples.Quintet<java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer,org.javatuples.Pair<org.javatuples.Pair<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer>,java.lang.Integer>,java.lang.Integer>> list)
        Break the list of token-tags into a list of medication findings.
        Parameters:
        list - e.g., [[warfarin, DIN, 0, [[warfarin, 0], 0], 0], [10mg, DOSE, 1, [[mg, 2], 2], 1], [tid, FREQ, 3, [[tid, 3], 3], 2], [,, TK, 4, [[,, 4], 4], 3], [simvastatin, DIN, 5, [[simvastatin, 5], 5], 4], [5mg, DOSE, 6, [[mg, 7], 7], 5], [bid, FREQ, 8, [[bid, 8], 8], 6], [., TK, 9, [[., 9], 9], 7]]
        Returns:
        medication_finding_list e.g., [[[,, TK, 4, [[,, 4], 4], 3], [simvastatin, DIN, 5, [[simvastatin, 5], 5], 4], [5mg, DOSE, 6, [[mg, 7], 7], 5], [bid, FREQ, 8, [[bid, 8], 8], 6], [., TK, 9, [[., 9], 9], 7]], [[warfarin, DIN, 0, [[warfarin, 0], 0], 0], [10mg, DOSE, 1, [[mg, 2], 2], 1], [tid, FREQ, 3, [[tid, 3], 3], 2]]]
        See Also:
        MedTagger

      • getCode

        private java.lang.String[] getCode(java.lang.String drug_name,
                         java.lang.String strength,
                         java.lang.String form,
                         java.lang.String brand)
        Given generic name, and its related RXNORM information and UMLS CUI information, strength and form, return the RXCUI and UMLS CUI
        Parameters:
        drug_name - name of drug (generic or brand)
        strength - drug strength
        form - drug form
        Returns:
        array of string contains UMLS code and RXNORM code e.g.{"C1123825", "328830"}
        See Also:
        MedTagger

      • print_result

        private java.util.Vector<DrugTag> print_result(int index,
                                     java.lang.String[] FStr_list,
                                     java.lang.String sent_text)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Output the result for drug tagging
        Parameters:
        index - index of current sentence
        FStr_list - list of identified drug signature information
        Returns:
        vector of DrugTag object to represent all the signatures
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
